11111111 00001000 01100110 01101110 01110110 11011110 01100010 01101010 01110010 11011010// trigger 12,13,14,27 4 led on,off
11111111 00000100 00010110 00010010 00010110 00010010 // led 2 blink twice
11111111 00001000 00010110 00010010 00010110 00010010 00010110 00010010 00010110 00010010 //blink 4 times

11111111 00000001 01110110 // keep 14 on
11111111 00000001 01110010 // shut 14
11111111 00000100 00101111 00101011 00101111 00101011 // blink 5

11111111 00001000 01101101 01110101 01100101 11011101 01101001 01110001 01100001 11011001 //all 4 devices switch on sequentially  and switch off in sequence as well
11111111 00001000 01101100 01110100 01100100 11011110 01101000 01110000 01100000 11011000//all on all of with no delay in between
11111111 00001000 01101100 01110100 01100100 11011110 01101001 01110001 01100001 11011001//switch on together switch off sequentially
11111111 00001000 01101101 01110101 01100101 11011110 01101000 01110000 01100000 11011000//switch on sequentially, switch off together after 2s
11111111 00001000 01101101 01110101 01100101 11011110 01101000 01110000 //keep 2 on after switching on sequentially
11111111 00000010 01100000 11011000//switch off both devices kept on in the above instruction
